text: Battleground was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on October 6, 2013 at the First Niagara Center in Buffalo, New York. The first event in the WWE Battleground event series, it was announced on the July 29 episode of Raw as the new October WWE pay-per-view which would replace Over the Limit. == Results == ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Battleground website Category:2013 in professional wrestling Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:Sports in Buffalo, New York Category:2010s in New York (state) Category:2013 in the United States Category:21st century in Buffalo, New York
title: Battleground (2013)
